title: Princess Anne: a royal romance
brief_description: Made on the occasion of the wedding of H.R.H. Princess Anne and Captain Mark Phillips; this film highlights the early life of the Princess, her childhood, schooling, introduction to royal duties and events leading up to her engagement. The climax of the film is the wedding ceremony in Westminster Abbey; closing with the young couple setting off from Buckingham Palace on their honeymoon. Contains some b&w archival footage.
